title: 2001/846/CFSP: Council Decision of 29 November 2001 extending the mandate of the Head of Mission of the European Union Monitoring Mission (EUMM)
header:
Council Decision
of 29 November 2001
extending the mandate of the Head of Mission of the European Union Monitoring Mission (EUMM)
(2001/846/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 23(2) thereof,
Having regard to Joint Action 2001/845/CFSP of 29 November 2001 extending the mandate of the European Union Monitoring Mission(1), and in particular Article 5 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) By Decision 2001/285/CFSP(2) of 9 April 2001, the Council appointed Mr Antóin MAC UNFRAIDH, whose mandate expires on 31 December 2001, Head of Mission of the EUMM.
(2) The mandate of the Head of Mission of the EUMM should be extended,
main_body: The mandate of Mr Antóin MAC UNFRAIDH as Head of Mission of the EUMM is hereby extended.

This Decision shall take effect on the date of its adoption.
It shall apply until 31 December 2002.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 29 November 2001.
For the Council
The President
M. Vanderpoorten
(1) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
(2) OJ L 99, 10.4.2001, p. 2.
